install.description:
Version:

JA News 1.1.2


Features:
- Support ALL charsets if iconv library are enabled.
- Support ISO-8859-1, ISO-8859-15, UTF-8, CP866, CP1251, CP1252, KOI8-R, BIG5, GB2312, BIG5-HKSCS, SHIFT_JIS, EUC-JP if iconv is not supported.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: showheadline
param.label: Show Headline
param.description: Show the top news above all other categories

param.name: numberofheadlinenews
param.label: Number of Headline news
param.description: Number of news showed in headline

param.name: headlineheight
param.label: Headline Fixed Height
param.description: Fixed height of headline, in pixels. Use 0 if you want the headline has flexible height.

param.name: delaytime
param.label: Rolling delay time
param.description: Time between two articles, in seconds

param.name: catid
param.label: Category ID
param.description: Selects items from a specific Category or set of Categories (to specify more than one Category, seperate with a comma , ).

param.name: width
param.label: Image Width
param.description: Fixed width of the image in pixel (set to -1 if you want to leave the image's default size

param.name: height
param.label: Image Height
param.description: Fixed height of the image in pixel (set to -1 if you want to leave the image's default size

param.name: cols
param.label: Columns
param.description: How many columns per row (Set to zero if you want to disable other news items)

param.name: showintro
param.label: Show Intro
param.description: Show the introtext of the latest news
